Docs.summary: The namespace provides advanced GDI+ typography functionality.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Basic graphics functionality is provided by the <xref:System.Drawing> namespace. The classes in this namespace allow users to create and use collections of fonts.
> [!CAUTION] > Classes within the <xref:System.Drawing.Text> namespace are not supported for use within a Windows or ASP.NET service. Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
